• Lee, Ryan K. On a Super Lawyers® List
  • Smith, G. David On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Representing clients in Rockwall, Kaufman and Dallas, Texas, our team at Smith & Lee, Lawyers, is known for returning significant awards in personal injury cases. Through mediation and litigation, our attorneys use every resource available to illustrate a defendant’s responsibility as well as enumerate each damage our clients have suffered. Since opening our law office, we have obtained favorable verdicts and settlements that help to expedite a victim’s recovery. Our practice includes handling criminal defense, wrongful death and mediated cases.

The team at our law office is steeped in experience. On staff, we have an attorney who is board certified through the Texas Board of Legal Specialization, a consultant with more than 20 years of experience working with juries, and a Spanish-language interpreter. We hold honors such as an Avvo “Superb” rating and being selected for inclusion in the Super Lawyers list. Active in the legal community, we are members of the Texas Trial Lawyers Association and the State Bar of Texas.

More important than our backgrounds and accolades is our honest, compassionate approach to clients. We understand that any legal situation creates stress and even confusion. Our law office is committed to effective communication, which means we explain the potential options and outcomes, and we promptly address any concerns that our client may have. Additionally, Smith & Lee, Lawyers, accepts credit cards.
